name: canvas-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Canvas LMS integration

tools.name: list_courses
tools.description: Lists all courses you are enrolled in, with options to filter by active, completed, or all courses.

tools.name: search_assignments
tools.description: Searches for assignments across all courses based on title, description, due dates, and course filters.

tools.name: get_assignment
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific assignment, including its description, submission requirements, and embedded links.
